TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 1 110 Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Purse 22000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REAGAL CAT bumped start, vied, prevailed. KR SHININ PILOTO broke in, vied between horses, missed. IMA POWERFUL JAMMER brushed in start, dueled, missed. AIR CAV PILOTO fractious behind gate, stuttered step start, rallied, missed. DASH THE DUCK broke in, no factor, shied at wire. SHAYLENNE broke in, yielded.

ENTRY.NAME: Kr Shinin Piloto
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, vied between horses, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Dash the Duck
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, no factor, shied at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Air Cav Piloto
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious behind gate, stuttered step start, rallied, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 2 110 Y Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 24000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGGIES SPECIAL GUY rallied, up. JOHNN T nailed. EB LITTLE O vied between horses, missed. HOLLEYHAWK no factor.

TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 3 250 Y Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Purse 22000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANGEROUS DEVA shifted in start, led, drifted out, held. MANYSHADESOFGRAY bump start, vied, denied. WUHAN CORONA slight stumble start, not enough. KIKNTIRES NLITNFIRES bump start, no menace. LADY FLEMINGS bump start, no factor. CRIOYO bumped/floated in start, outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 4 250 Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 24000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STOLIN HOME BREW brushed start, led, held. BLACKIE CHAN vied, denied. PEVS QUEEN OF HEARTS broke out, gaining. FREEDOM SPEAKS vied, yielded late. J V TWO leaned in / brush start, no factor. FAMOUS GHOST CASH fractious behind gate, outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE RACE 5 250 Y Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 12500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FK HOKA HEY vied, ridden out. PERRY SPECIAL CHICK vied inside, lugged in. FM RENE bump start, chased, faded. ANGEL PRIZE bump start, outrun. A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REVIEWING THE START RESULTED IN NO CHANGE TO THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE
